name: KILLED TO DEATH
description:
There's nothing but You, Your Gun, and Bad Choices in this cramped arena!

There's a lot I wished I could have done more with this game, but I'm happy I got a working build ready for you all to play!

I thought this was mechanic was going to be easy to implement, but I found out how wrong I was halfway through Saturday!

I hope you guys enjoy this little prototype game, and good luck with your submissions! I'll play as many as I can!
